Toribash

Quick Start
-----------
Click joints to manipulate character. Hit Space when ready with move. Control camera with arrow keys


Multiplayer and Options
------------------------
Press ESC to bring up menu.


Tutorials
---------
See video tutorials on the Toribash.com website


Manual
------
manual.txt


Forum
----
For help and toribash discussions visit http://www.toribash.com/forum
